info.name: Firefox 4  - Rounded Tabs
info.description:
Restores to the tabs the rounded look they had before the 03/03/10 build which introduced a more square look. Tab border image is from the previous nightly build.

WFM in Firefox 4 and Minefield 4.2a1pre on Win7
info.additionalInfo:
Now compatible with TMP (thanks! user 61655)
12.28.12 - for Fx Nightly 12.0a1 2011-12-24 Cset f63a99195987 style compatibility fix see http://tiny.cc/gecvl -thanks user 61655  
03.30.11 - compat fot 
03.26.11 - compat for TMP
03.25.11 - compat for Minefield
03.22.11 - compatibility fixes

data.title: Modified Style code to fix stretched tabs on Firefox(Minefield) 4.2a1pre (2011-03-24)
is there a style that explictly reverses this effect(forced square corners)
